The JBL Tune 720BT headphones stream powerful JBL Pure Bass Thanks to the latest 5.3 BT technology. Easy to use, these headphones provide up to 76 hours of pure pleasure and an extra 3 hours of battery with just 5 minutes of charge.
Download the free JBL Headphones App And customize your sound through the EQ, while Voice Prompts guide you through the headphones features. Manage calls, sound and volume from the earcup, thanks to the convenient button control. If a call comes in while you are watching a video on another device, the JBL Tune 720BT seamlessly switch to your mobile, so you never miss a call. lightweight and comfortable even after hours of listening, the JBL Tune 720BT headphones fold flat in your backpack to follow you everywhere.
Specifications: Driver Size: 40 mm / 1.57 “ Dynamic driver Power supply: 5 V 1 A Weight: 220 g / 0.485 lbs Headset battery type: Lithium-ion battery (3.7V / 500 mAh) Charging time: 2 hrs Music playtime with BT on: up to 76 hrs Frequency response: 20 Hz –20 kHz Impedance: 32 ohm Sensitivity: 101 dB SPL@ 1kHz 1mW Maximum SPL: 95 dB Microphone sensitivity: -40 dBV@1kHz/Pa Bluetooth version: 5.3 Bluetooth profile version: HFP 1.7.2, AVRCP 1.6.2, A2DP 1.3.2 Bluetooth transmitter frequency range: 2.4 GHz – 2.4835 GHz Bluetooth transmitted power: 10 dBm (E.I.R.P) Bluetooth transmitted modulation: GFSK, /4DQPSK,8DPSK

Tečni prikaz pokreta Iznimno velika brzina od 144 Hz omogućuje igračima da brže vide sljedeću sličicu i da slika bude jasnija. Igrači mogu brže reagirati na protivnike i lakše ciljati u mete.
Osmišljen za nevjerojatnu brzinu Uz IPS 1 ms koji se približava brzini TN, u potpunosti smanjeno zaostajanje slike i kratko vrijeme odziva, uživajte u potpuno novoj učinkovitosti u igranju videoigara.

SPECIFIKACIJA: • PC mikrofon • Ručni i stolni sistem postavljanja • Odlična kvaliteta snimanja glasa • Daje briljantni i čisti zvuk • Ergonomski i lagan • Praktični stalak za sigurnu poziciju i postavljanje kuta • Praktični prekidač za paljenje i gašenje • Robusne je konstrukcije • Lako se instalira • Priključak 3.5mm • Dužina kabela 2m

Mehanička preciznost u kombinaciji s učinkovitim dizajnom i modernom optikom - ovo je VELA LED gaming tipkovnica. Metalni poklopac i jedanaest načina osvjetljenja ističu izgled u punoj veličini, koji je dizajniran imajući na umu brzu akciju. Mehaničke tipke s plavim prekidačima impresioniraju taktilnim i akustičnim povratnim informacijama. Osim ugodnog osjećaja, osiguravaju i dug životni vijek.

Keep it fresh and fierce with the Minty Legends Pack. Everything you need to chill out the competition including: - Fresh Aura, Minty Bomber and Skellemint Oro outfits - Three spearing Pickaxes - One spicy hot Wrap - 1,000 V-Bucks
From the smoldering wreckage of the Mothership a new threat arises. Cubes are waking up, spreading corruption, and creating Rifts to “The Sideways.”
Enter the Sideways to take on monsters and find Sideways Weapons. Rev up these new weapons to their superpowered state.

proizvod.naziv: 3D olovka Creality 3D Printing Pen, s filamentima
proizvod.opis:
Easy to Use Simple operation to make 3D printing without cumbersome buttons and drawing much easier. No more worries about complicated instructions.
Quick Recharging Fast charging at 5V/1A, 1-hour charging for 60 minutes sustainable power, 1-week standby, long battery life, and low power consumption, let kids enjoy 3D printing.
Ecofriendly filaments It is made of starch extracted from plants, safe and secure, non-toxic, and no odor.

SILENCE IN EVERY CLICK Forget about distracting clicking sounds. M220 reduces over 90% of noise, creating a quieter and more productive environment for you and those around you. The small size and smooth cursor control make it great for tight workspaces and busy desks.

Inferno series UVI Inferno is a series of mouse pads, designed for gaming. Every gamer has their own preferences.
Seamless Anti-Fray Stitching UVI Inferno has seamless anti-fray stitched edges, which prevent unwanted tearing and offer resistance to daily wear, while also improving durability and longevity.

EXTENSIVE GAME SUPPORT Play console ports with their native-style controller or adopt a more relaxed position while enjoying PC games. F310 is easy to set up and use with your favorite games thanks to XInput/DirectInput .
